game.shortDescription: 단테의 기원을 재해석한 이야기를 다루는 DmC Devil May Cry™는 스타일리시한 액션을 유지합니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: In this retelling of Dante's origin story which is set against a contemporary backdrop, DmC Devil May Cry™ retains the stylish action.

reviewHighlights.text: Ignoring all the "This is not real DMC" matters, this is a very good game. It is too good tbh
If you can, buy the Definitive Edition on console instead. If not, play this with mods. The writing swings wildly between immature and derivative, but...
